title: WaPo Berlin
overview: Chief Criminal Investigation Commissioner Jasmin Sayed is leading the newly launched pilot project "Water Criminal Police Unit One of the Berlin Water Protection Police", or WaPo Berlin for short. Jasmin has lived in Germany for 30 years and knows only too well that legal security is not a matter of course. Defending the law drives them on. To achieve her goal, she has put together a colorful team that she can rely on.
